de.ityx.mediatrix.api.client

Interface ICCustomer


  • public interface ICCustomer
    Provides functions to manage customer objects Customer.
    How to use:
    API.getClientAPI().getCustomerAPI().store(customer);

      • loadCustomerInfo

        List<CustomerInfo> loadCustomerInfo(boolean isInvalidEmail,
                                  String emailAddress,
                                  String name,
                                  String firstname,
                                  String comment,
                                  String externalId,
                                  String postcode,
                                  String country,
                                  String companyName,
                                  boolean isTimeInput,
                                  long timeFrom,
                                  long timeTo,
                                  int prio,
                                  String prioType,
                                  boolean isKeywordCheck,
                                  List<Keyword> keywords,
                                  List<Integer> projects)
        Loads the customer informations according to the method parameter.
        Parameters:
        isInvalidEmail - Email status
        emailAddress - Email Address
        name - Customer Name
        firstname - Customer first name
        comment - Customer comments
        externalId - Customer External ID
        postcode - Customer Post code
        country - Customer Country
        companyName - Customer's company
        isTimeInput - Input Time
        timeFrom - Customer Time FROM
        timeTo - Customer Time TO
        prio - Priority
        prioType - Priority Type
        isKeywordCheck - Check if Keyword
        keywords - Keywords
        projects - Projects from Customer
        Returns:
        A List containing the Customer's Informations
        was:
        loadKundenInfo

      • loadCases

        boolean loadCases(Customer customer,
                boolean openCases,
                boolean export)
        Loads cases for the customer.
        Parameters:
        customer - Customer
        openCases - true - loads the cases where the questions are not completed.
        export - true - loads all cases.
        Returns:
        true - the loading process was successful.
        was:
        loadVorgaenge

      • loadCases

        boolean loadCases(Customer customer,
                boolean openCases,
                boolean export,
                int subprojectid)
        Loads cases for the customer. The cases contain questions assigned to the subproject.
        Parameters:
        subprojectid - subproject id:
        id = 0 - questions assigned to the subprojects in that the operator has responsibilities.
        id > 0 - questions for the specified subproject.
        Returns:
        boolean true if loaded
        See Also:
        loadCases(Customer myObj, boolean openCases, boolean export)
        was:
        loadVorgaenge

        Parameters:
        myObj - Customer
        Returns:
        true if stored :else false

      • findCustomers

        List<Customer> findCustomers(String firstname,
                           String name,
                           String externalId,
                           String email,
                           String comment,
                           String project,
                           List<Integer> subprojects,
                           List<Long> date,
                           String prioType,
                           int priority,
                           String postcode,
                           String country,
                           String countryName,
                           List<Integer> keyword,
                           List<Object> noticeMask,
                           boolean invalidEmail)
        Finds the customer by given parameters.
        Parameters:
        firstname - Customer First Name
        name - Customer Name
        externalId - Customer ExternalID
        email - Customer Email
        comment - Customer Comments
        project - Customer Project
        subprojects - Customer Sub-projects
        date - Date
        prioType - Priority Type
        priority - Priority
        postcode - Post code
        country - Country
        countryName - Country Name
        keyword - Keyword
        noticeMask - Notice Mask
        invalidEmail - Invalid Email
        Returns:
        A List containing the customer corresponding to the Parameter Constraint
        was:
        sucheKunde

        primaryCustomerId - - Primary Customer ID
        primaryCustomerSCaseId - - Primary Customer Process ID

      • exportCustomer

        String exportCustomer(String vorname,
                    String surname,
                    String externalId,
                    String emailAddress,
                    String comment,
                    String projektIdsAsString,
                    List<Integer> listOfSubprojectIds,
                    List<Long> date,
                    String prioType,
                    int prioValue,
                    String postcode,
                    String country,
                    String companyName,
                    List<Integer> keywordIdList,
                    List<Object> noticeMask,
                    boolean invalidEmail)
        Exports a Customer
        Parameters:
        vorname - first name
        surname - Surname
        externalId - ExtnalId
        emailAddress - EmailAddress
        comment - Comments
        projektIdsAsString - Project Name
        listOfSubprojectIds - List of Sub projects
        date - Date
        prioType - Priority Type
        prioValue - Priority Value
        postcode - Post Code *
        country - Country
        companyName - Company Name
        keywordIdList - Buzzword List
        noticeMask - notice Mask
        invalidEmailInvalid - Email status
        Returns:
        string with customer parameters to export
        was:
        exportKunde

      • loadCustomerById

        List<Customer> loadCustomerById(int minId,
                              int maxId,
                              int operatorId,
                              List<Integer> responsiblities)
        Returns the customers by the given Parameters
        Parameters:
        minId - Minimum ID of Customer
        maxId - Maximum ID of Customer
        operatorId - id of operator to show if the operator has permission to search in subprojects that will be set in "responsabilities"
        responsabilities - a list of subproject ids in that customers will be searched
        Returns:
        A List of customers
        was:
        getKundeByID

      • loadByEmailAddress

        Customer loadByEmailAddress(String emailAddress,
                          int projectId)
        Searches for the customer with the email address for the specified project id. The search process runs sequential starting with the first email address and ending with the fourth email address.
        Parameters:
        emailAddress - email address
        projectId - project id
        Returns:
        Returns the customer if it's found.
